column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////THE BAD: We rushed to get there exactly 8:20pm and that is where the BAD started. We walked in and we were told it would just be a few minutes
column2: but we should just go sit inside and get a drink. I was famished
column3: and the last thing I wanted was to wait. I had just spoke to the hostess 25 minutes ago arriving exactly when I said
column4: for an 8pm table that she was holding. How is it that 20 min after our reservation someone is still eating at our table? I'll tell you
column5: poor management skills for an upscale restaurant is how.
